title.rendered: National Population Commission NPC Recruitment Portal  2024

content.rendered:
National Population Commission NPC Recruitment Portal 2024 – 2024 Census, NPC Adhoc Staff.

To participate in the forthcoming National Population Commission NPC Census 2024 exercise, apply now to become an Adhoc staff. The Management of Nigeria Population Commission NPC has reopened its E-Recruitment Portal To Recruit More Adhoc Staff ahead of the 2024 census. Interested Applicants can Apply Now via the link below:

Available Job Positions:

According to the NPC management, the categories of staff to be recruited include:

  • Facilitators
  • Training Center Administrators
  • Monitoring & Evaluation Officers
  • Data Quality Managers
  • Data Quality Assistants
  • Supervisors, Enumerators, and Special Workforce.

 

NPC Application Requirements:

The NPC management explained that the basic requirements for the application, were:

  1. National Identification Number
  2. Valid and Functional Gmail Account
  3. Valid and Functional Phone Number
  4. Valid and Functional /Operational Commercial Bank Account (No student/NYSC Account)
  5. Valid Educational Qualifications
  6. referees
  7. Access to and knowledge on the use of computers, tablets & smartphones is an added advantage.

 

How to Apply

Interested Applicants should apply via https://2024censusadhocrecruitment.nationalpopulation.gov.ng
